{"rule":"THE_SUPERLATIVE","sentence":"^\\QTime Complexity: Best Case: O(1) (when inserting at the beginning of the linked list) Worst Case: O(n) (when inserting at the end of the linked list or when the target value is in the middle of the linked list) Space Complexity: O(1) - the algorithm uses a constant amount of extra space to insert a node, regardless of the size of the linked list.\\E$"}
